nodes.text: Moshi Bar was a tavern located on Coruscant during the Clone Wars. It was owned by a male Volpai bartender named Tiggs Leo.

In 21 BBY, Moshi Bar was visited by Jedi Master Plo Koon and Jedi Padawan Ahsoka Tano searching for information on Jango Fett. A fight was going to erupt in the tavern due to Ahsoka's eavesdropping, but was prevented from Ahsoka's distraction and Leo's reluctance for his bar to be damaged.

Moshi Bar first appeared in "Lethal Trackdown," the twenty second episode of the animated series Star Wars: The Clone Wars' second season. Although it went unidentified in its sole appearance, the tavern was identified as Moshi Bar in concept art available on the Blu-ray version of Star Wars: The Clone Wars The Complete Season Two.
